name: Tonari no Totoro
storyline: The game is a simple pixilated 4 MB game that places you in the shoes of Mei Mei. You move back and forth and have to collect as many acorns as you can under a certain amount of time.
summary: Fan game based on the movie "My Neighbor Totoro"
